摐摐摐
Links: aedict | jisho | koohii | hanziyuan | kanshudo | wiktionary | purpleculture | rtega | trainchinese | bkrs | humanum | Baido | yw11 | Pleco Search | Pleco

摐字的基本解释

摐
chuāng
敲击：“摐金鼓，吹鸣籁。”
高耸：“乔木维摐，飞鸟过之或降。”
纷错：万象摐然。

摐字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chuāng］
［《廣韻》楚江切，平江，初。］
［《廣韻》七恭切，平鍾，清。］
“鏦2”的被通假字。
(1)撞击。
(2)引申指演奏。
(3)高耸。
(4)纷错。
(5)象声词。参见“摐摐”。

摐字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　摐； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页449第16
【唐韻】楚江切【集韻】【韻會】初江切，?音窗。【博雅】撞也。【司馬相如·子虛賦】摐金鼓吹鳴籟。【韓愈·贈張籍詩】扶几導之言，曲節初摐摐。　又撩也。【揚子·太?經】喬木維摐，飛鳥過之或降。【註】上撩之木，鳥所不集。　又【唐韻】【集韻】?七恭切，音樅。義同。

摐字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
摐字的起名意思

暂无。

Squeeze
Basic explanation of words
Squeeze
chuāng
Percussion: "Push the golden drum and blow the sound."
Towering: "Qiao Muwei squeezes, birds pass or descend."
Mistakes: Vientiane.
Squeeze
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chuāng］
["Guangyun" Chu Jiangqi, Pingjiang, Chu. ]
["Guangyun" Seven Respect Cut, Pingzhong, Qing Dynasty. ]
"鏦2" was passed falsely.
(1) Impact.
(2) Extended refers to performance.
(3) Towering.
(4) Mistakes.
(5) Onomatopoeia. See "Punch".
Squeeze
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　摐; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 449-16
[Tang Yun] Chu Jiangqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Chu Jiangqie, sound window. [Bo Ya] Hit it. 【Sima Xiangru·Zixu Fu】Pushing Jin to preach Ming Lai. [Han Yu·Gifts from Zhang Ji Poems] The introduction of Fu Ji, the beginning of the festival.　Fuck again. 【Yangtze·Tai? Classic】The arbor will be picked up, and the birds will pass or descend. [Note] The wood of the upper 撩之木 is not collected by the birds.　[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Seven respectful cuts, Yin Cong. The same meaning.
Squeeze

Squeeze
Name meaning
Nothing.
chuāng, cōng
гл. бить, ударять, колотить (в гонг, барабан)
摐金鼓 бить в гонги и барабаны
